#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

int ball[1010],catches[1010];

int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n,count=0;
		cin>>n;
//		int ball[n],catches[n];
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			cin>>ball[i];
			catches[i]=0;
		}
		for(int j=1;j<n;j++)
		{
			for(int k=0;k<j;k++)
			{
				if(ball[j]>=ball[k] && catches[j]<catches[k]+1)
				{
					catches[j]=catches[k]+1;
				}
			}
		}
		int maxim=0;
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
		{
			if(catches[i]>maxim)maxim=catches[i];
		}
		cout<<maxim+1<<endl;
		
	}
}
